content.text:
# Screen Award for Best Female Debut

The Star Screen Award for Most Promising Newcomer â€“ Female is chosen by a distinguished panel of judges from the Indian Bollywood film industry and the winners are announced in January. The first woman to receive this award was Sonali Bendre.
